text: Conditions: valid for a group of up to four people travelling together Age restrictions: All members of the group have to be younger than 25 years old There are several more SBB Day Passes out there like the day pass for dogs, children or bikes. If you're interested in those, check out this site on Swiss Activities . Otherwise, you're all set with your knowledge to plan your trip to Switzerland by public transport. Enjoy the ride!
